amendment.description: To strike a provision of the bill and insert authority for the Secretary of Transportation.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2791 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2791 proposed by Senator Murray. (consideration: CR S11294; text: CR S11294) To strike a provision of the bill and insert authority for the Secretary of Transportation.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2791 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2791 proposed by Senator Murray.
